title: News24.com | New York welcomes hospital ship as coronavirus accelerates
description: A hospital ship has arrived in New York as America's coronavirus epicentre prepares for the peak of the pandemic, with emergency restrictions extended amid grim warnings about the death toll.
content:
A hospital ship arrived in New York Monday as America's coronavirus epicenter prepares for the peak of the pandemic, with emergency restrictions extended amid grim warnings about the death toll.
